card.title: Studies in Product Thinking
card.description: Whether as a creative exercise or a challenge in solving real problems, I love to push boundaries and explore. Hereâ€™s a glimpse of work done in the past.

header.title: Overview
text: The Pilot app is a translation application that corresponds with its smart wearables counterpart developed by Waverly Labs, a consumer electronics company. They use the latest technologies in machine translation and speech recognition for their flagship product to allow wearers to speak different languages while clearly understanding each other.
